team.name: Dr. Marcus Greene
team.bio: Ph.D. in Environmental Science from Stanford. Visionary leader and advocate for eco-conscious innovations.

team.name: Aisha Kwon
team.bio: Background in bio-engineering; leads technology development by harnessing nature's wisdom.

team.name: Carlos Mendoza
team.bio: Design Academy Eindhoven alumnus; blends minimalism with bio-inspired design.

team.name: Lydia D'souza
team.bio: Expert in sustainable supply chains, ensuring ethical and green operations.

team.name: Jamal Ahmed
team.bio: Former environmental studies professor; curates educational content for EcoLearn.

awards.title: Urban Green Expansion
awards.details: GreenRoof™ installations increased urban green spaces by 150% in Seattle and Austin.

awards.title: UNICEF Partnership
awards.details: Partnered with UNICEF to implement PureStream Filters™ in areas suffering from water scarcity.

awards.title: TerraCharge™ Adoption
awards.details: TerraCharge™ pathways adopted by 20 major city parks globally.
